m_szDocTitle: Tesla's Chief Designer: We'll Build & Sell 500,000 EVs A Year By 2020
m_szDocSumamry: November 7th, 2014 by James Ayre   In a recent interview with Germany’s Manager Magazin Online, Tesla Motors’ Chief Designer Jerome Guillen made the comment that the company is aiming to build and sell at least 500,000 EVs a year by the year 2020. While this certainly isn’t the first time that one of Tesla’s higher-ups have made such a bold statement (Elon Musk, I’m looking at you), the comment is well worth taking note of.
